segments.text: Welcome to our tutorial on mastering AI Image Generation with [PRODUCT]! Whether you are an artist, designer, or just love creating, you’re in the right place to learn how this powerful tool can transform your ideas into stunning visuals.
segments.visualPrompt: A computer screen displaying the logo of [PRODUCT] with vibrant, abstract AI-generated images floating around it.

segments.text: First, let’s dive into setting up your account and getting started. After signing up, navigate to the dashboard. Here you'll find the 'Create New Image' button. Clicking this will open up a world of possibilities where you can specify your image requirements.
segments.visualPrompt: A user interface of [PRODUCT] showing the dashboard with the 'Create New Image' button highlighted.

segments.text: First, let’s dive into setting up your account and getting started. After signing up, navigate to the dashboard. Here you'll find the 'Create New Image' button. Clicking this will open up a world of possibilities where you can specify your image requirements.

segments.text: And that's a wrap on the basics of using [PRODUCT] for AI-generated imagery! Experiment with different prompts and settings to fully unleash your creativity. The possibilities are endless, and we can't wait to see what incredible visuals you'll create.
